message.content:
cs.CR, cs.AI, cs.DB, cs.NI, cs.SE 

The paper deals with the detection of advanced persistent threats (APTs) in computer networks using machine learning and graph databases. This topic falls under the category of computer security (cs.CR) as well as artificial intelligence (cs.AI) since machine learning is used. The use of time series databases and graph databases also suggests that the paper could be classified under databases (cs.DB) and networked systems (cs.NI). Finally, the paper also discusses the practical implementation of the proposed approach, which could place it under software engineering (cs.SE).
